title: Program Catalog Civil Engineering
program_name: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
slu_vision_mission: Saint Louis University envisions itself as an excellent missionary and transformative educational institution, developing globally competitive, locally responsive, and empowered individuals who are competent, creative, socially involved, and imbued with the Christian spirit.
school_vision_mission: The School of Engineering and Architecture aims to be an exemplary institution in engineering and architecture, committed to elevating instruction, research, and community extension, and shaping the socio-technical environment through Christian values.
educational_objectives: Demonstrate technical competence in solving engineering problems with consideration for professional, societal, environmental, and ethical factors.
Practice their profession guided by honesty, service, dedication, and moral responsibility.
Pursue graduate studies, research, and technological innovation.
Participate in addressing social, technical, and business challenges for national development.
learning_outcomes: Apply knowledge of math, science, and engineering fundamentals.
Design systems that consider health, safety, culture, and the environment.
Work effectively in multidisciplinary and diverse teams.
Identify and solve complex engineering problems using scientific principles.
Uphold ethical responsibilities in professional practice.
Communicate effectively with engineering and general audiences.
Evaluate sustainability and societal impact of engineering work.
Assess legal, social, and cultural aspects of engineering solutions.
Use modern tools and information technology effectively within limitations.
Apply management and economic principles in projects.
Demonstrate competence in a specialized Civil Engineering field.
Practice Christian values in professional life.

admission_policies.freshmen: Must pass Saint Louis University College Entrance Examination.
admission_policies.transferees: Must pass Qualifying Examination, Personality Test, and Interview.
admission_policies.graduate_students: Must hold relevant undergraduate or graduate degrees.
foreign_students: Must apply 6 months before term start.
Must pass English Proficiency Test and entrance examinations.
Must secure a valid Student Visa.

tuition_and_fees.note: Subject to change without prior notice
